p.strong: Elementary At-Home Learning Packet #3 for Weeks 5-6, April 20th-May 1st

span.p: Paper Copies of Packets can be picked up from your child's school.

p.strong: Middle School At-Home Learning Packet #3 for Weeks 5-6, April 20th-May 1st

span.p: Paper Copies of Packets can be picked up from your child's school. Students can use their devices to access content online through Google Classroom.

a.title: Go to comments for At-Home Learning Packets - April 20th-May 1st

em.strong: Please click on the links below to view the information.

p.a: Madison County Schools K-8 Remote Learning Grading Policy 3/31/20
Madison County Schools 9-13 Remote Learning Grading Policy 4/01/20

a.title: Go to comments for MCS K-8 and 9-13 Remote Learning Grading Policies

span.strong: Looking for Other Ways to Engage Your Child in Learning? Take a look at these Online Educational Resources for Students and Families.

strong.a: Khan Academy - Online Lessons, Every Subject, Every Grade Level
GeoGebra - Graphing Calculator for Math - Grades 8-12
Desmos Math Graphing Calculator for Grades 8-12
Scholastic Magazine Learn At Home Articles / Activities
K-5 Math Investigations Words and Concepts Review
Story Time with Ryan and Craig
BookFlix - Hundreds of Informational and Literature Texts
Storyline Online - Hundreds of Great Stories read aloud to students
Prodigy - Online Math Skill Practice Games
Raz Kids - online guided reading texts

a.title: Go to comments for Online Educational Resources

p.strong: Elementary At-Home Learning Packets for Weeks 3-4, March 30th-April 10th

span.p: Paper Copies of Packets can be picked up from your child's school. Please call the school if you need a paper packet.

p.strong: Middle School At-Home Learning Packets for Weeks 3-4, March 30th-April 10th

span.p: Paper Copies of Packets and Student Devices can be picked up from your child's school. Please call the school if you need a paper packet or a device. Students can use their devices to access content online through Google Classroom.

a.title: Go to comments for At-Home Learning Packets for Weeks 3-4, March 30th-April 10th

span.strong: Elementary At-Home Learning Packets for Weeks 1-2, March 16th-March 27th
Middle School At-Home Learning Packets for Weeks 1-2, March 16th-March 27th

p.span: Paper Copies of Packets were sent home with students on March 13th. If you need another copy, a paper copy can be picked up from Madison Middle School. If your child needs their packet delivered to the home, please call your child's school.

a.title: Go to comments for At-Home Learning Packets for Weeks 1-2, March 16-March 27
